ui.panel.profile.push_notifications.head: Notificacions push
ui.panel.profile.push_notifications.erro: Requereix tenir SSL habilitat a la interfície (frontend).
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.descript: Each refresh token represents a login session. Refresh tokens will be automatically removed when you click log out. Below a list of refresh tokens that are currently active for your account.
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.confirm_: Are you sure you want to delete the refresh token for {name}?
ui.panel.profile.refresh_tokens.delete_f: Failed to delete the refresh token.
ui.panel.profile.long_lived_access_token: Create long-lived access tokens to allow your scripts to interact with your Home Assistant instance. Each token will be valid for 10 years from creation. The following long-lived access tokens are currently active.
Learn how to make authenticated requests.
Are you sure you want to delete the access token for {name}?
Failed to delete the access token.
Failed to create the access token.
Copy your access token. It will not be shown again.
You have no long-lived access tokens yet.
